extends JobCollection
implements Node

isQuietingDown

public boolean isQuietingDown()
Returns true if Hudson is quieting down.

No further jobs will be executed unless it can be finished while other current pending builds are still in progress.

public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllCvsRoots()
Returns all CVSROOT strings used in the current Hudson installation.
